thread.section_title: MmoGah 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 MmoGah 的点评意见 | mmogah.com
thread.title: Ryo Marie
thread.title_full: MmoGah 的点评人 Ryo Marie

author: Ryo Marie
title: Ryo Marie
text:
I had been very skeptical of buying gil at first, so i gave it a shot with their lowest amount. Nearly as soon as I sent it out did I receive a tell providing me with a location. It was great! I've since bought from them several times, each proving to be as quick as the next. When I chatted with them after the payment, the response was quick and reassuring.
I may fear my friends finding out about me buying gil, but I am now secure in the fact that this company is one I can trust!
100/10 - the best!
